summary: A young guy decides to skip college in favor of joining his father on the lot of his used-car business.
cast: Christopher Meloni|Devon Bostick|Dean Norris|Bridget Moynahan|Xander Berkeley|Ashley Jensen|Garcelle Beauvais|Amaury Nolasco|Ken Davitian|Gregory Itzin|Kevin Nealon|Andrew James Allen|Misty Monroe|Barbara Gruen|Fidel Gomez|Ronnie Gene Blevins|Pramode Kumar|Sathya Jesudasson|Charles Halford|Jan Hoag|Jennifer Lorch|Erin Matthews|Brendan Patrick Connor|Carlo Rota|Zuhair Haddad|Michael Hartney|Samantha Hertz|Leah Appell|Soledad St. Hilaire|Brody Moller|Barry Primus|Adam Masnyk|Chris Tomlinson
title: Small Time
